Uses of Class
moteur.Observable

  • Packages that use Observable 
    Package Description
    controller
    The package controller containes two classes, the Starter and the GameController.
    moteur
    The package moteur containes the classes of Arbitre, Cards, CardsAJouer, CarteCouleur, CarteValeur, DrawDeck, InvalidNumberException, Jest, Observable, Offer, Player, PlayerReel, PlayerVirtuel, Stack, Trophie and Visitor.
    Vue
    Using the concept "VMP", this packages containes the views of the project.

    • Uses of Observable in controller

      Subclasses of Observable in controller 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  GameController
      The class GameController is the core of our projet, it is a controller who ensures all the smooth operations of the game.

    • Uses of Observable in moteur

      Subclasses of Observable in moteur 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Player
      This class is the class for a Player, in the game, a player should be able to act like a human, which is to say, choose a card to turn up or down at the begining of each turn, or choose the offer from another player, and also at the stage of calculating the points, player should accept the visitor who is the Arbitre to check the cards, so it containes the methode accept().
      class  PlayerReel
      The class PlayerReel is a player, so it extends Player, thus, a PlayerReel will take all of the attributs and methodes of its super class.
      class  PlayerVirtuel
      The class PlayerVirtual is also a player, so it extends Player, thus, a PlayerVirtual will take all of the attributs and methodes of its super class.

    • Uses of Observable in Vue

      Methods in Vue with parameters of type Observable 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void mainFrame.update​(Observable o, java.lang.Object arg)
      The function obligatory to implement with the interface Observer.It will update the information for current players in the window.
      void Observer.update​(Observable o, java.lang.Object arg)  
      void VuePlayer.update​(Observable o, java.lang.Object arg)
      This function is obligatory to be implemented because it has implemented the interface Observer.
